Test for intersection.

Parameters:
aX - Rect a, top-left x.
aY - Rect a, top-left y.
aW - Rect a, width.
aH - Rect a, height.
bX - Rect b, top-left x.
bY - Rect b, top-left y.
bW - Rect b, width.
bH - Rect b, height.
Returns:
Returns true if intersection occurs, false if not.

Check for containment of rect b in rect a.

Parameters:
aX - Rect a, top-left x.
aY - Rect a, top-left y.
aW - Rect a, width.
aH - Rect a, height.
bX - Rect b, top-left x.
bY - Rect b, top-left y.
bW - Rect b, width.
bH - Rect b, height.
Returns:
Returns true if rect a contains rect b, false if not.
